thread.title: Transportation Safety Board of Canada deploys team following air accident near New Tecumseh, Ontario

author: cbs8
title: Transportation Safety Board of Canada deploys team following air accident near New Tecumseh, Ontario
text:
Transportation Safety Board of Canada
RICHMOND HILL, ON , Oct. 17, 2015 The Transportation Safety Board of Canada (TSB) is deploying a team following an accident involving a small aircraft near New Tecumseh, Ontario . ?The TSB will gather information and assess the occurrence.
The TSB is an independent agency that investigates marine, pipeline, railway and aviation transportation occurrences. Its sole aim is the advancement of transportation safety. It is not the function of the Board to assign fault or determine civil or criminal liability.
